head.title: Paterson Charter School for Science and Technology

meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of the Paterson Charter School for Science and Technology is to provide a responsive educational model that will empower all students, through a standards â€“ equity based academic program founded on expectations for high achievement that will graduate literate, responsible, self-directed persons who have the core knowledge and skills needed to be successful, contributing members of society.

meta.content: Paterson Charter School, Science and Technology, Charter School in Paterson

article.aria-label: Grab & go breakfast and lunch at our 7-12 Campus

h3.a: Grab & go breakfast and lunch at our 7-12 Campus

div.div: During the spring break, we will continue to provide grab & go breakfast and lunch at our 7-12 Campus between 10:00 AM and 1:00 PM on Monday and Thursday.

article.aria-label: Child Care Resource and Referral Agency

h3.a: Child Care Resource and Referral Agency

div.div: Parents and guardians in need of child care can contact the Child Care Resource and Referral Agency in their county.
